skins.selfIntroduction: The name's Dace! My three favorite things are torpedoes, torpedo launchers, and uh, more torpedoes! My class? Oh right, I'm a Gato-class... If I remember properly, one of my achievements included taking out that Maya fellow... wonder if she's around.
skins.acquisition: Hi~ are you my new commander? I'm Dace from the Eagle Union, reporting for duty. I believe in shooting torpedoes first, and asking questions later~
skins.login: Ah, Commander, good timing! Mind helping me pick up those torpedoes next to your feet~?
skins.details: The gleam of the metal, the coolness to the touch, the distinctive splash, and of course, the explosion... Ahh, Commander, torpedoes are simply the best!
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Dace's Torpedo Circus." It's always been a dream of mine to make that happen one day!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I'm going to give you a crash course on torpedoes! Trust me, you'll be fascinated!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, wanna have some torpedo chocolate or torpedo bread? Here, have some, I made 'em myself!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, have you ever seen a dozen torpedoes go off at once? Don't you think it'd make for an awesome light show?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Torpedo volley! Locked on to Commander~!
